ProductInfo.Features:

<8> 40.5mm UV Filter + <9> 49mm UV Filter + <10> Shutter Remote Control + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<12> Op/Tech Utility Strap-Sling + <13> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> LCD Screen Protectors
